sn2.19:1.2: Standing to one side, the godling Uttara spoke this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn2.19:2.1: “This life, so very short, is led onward.
sn2.19:2.2: One led on to old age has no shelter.
sn2.19:2.4: do good deeds that bring you joy.”
sn2.19:3.1: “This life, so very short, is led onward.
sn2.19:3.2: One led on to old age has no shelter.
sn2.19:3.4: a seeker of peace would drop the world’s bait.”
